hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/ksh
VERSION=`ssh tcserver@dvappdai01 "grep Implementation-Version /opt/tcserver/instances/billing/webapps/dai-billing/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '\r'"`
print Gathering build version to be deployed print -------------------------------------- print print Deploying version ${VERSION} print print
/opt/build/scripts/tcServerAdmin.sh dvappdai02 billing stop
cd /opt/build/scripts ./kill_dbsessions.sh -a dai-billing -e scrum1
cd /opt/checkouts/dai-billing/grails-app/migrations/cisys echo "@genUser.scrum1.sql;" | sqlplus -s 'cm_system/oracle123@(DESCRIPTION=(ADDRESS_LIST=(ADDRESS=(PROTOCOL=TCP)(HOST=10.13.18.119)(PORT=1522)))(CONNECT_DATA=(SERVICE_NAME=scrum001)))'
STATUS=${?} if [[ ${STATUS} != "0" ]]; then exit ${STATUS} fi
cd /opt/checkouts/oss_deployment/scripts
print Beginning Rebuild from scratch for app/db to latest package version ${VERSION} print ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
./deployRebuildDb.sh -a dai-billing -t dai-billing -i billing -r ${VERSION} -e scrum1 -j "jdbc:oracle:thin:@10.13.18.119:1522:scrum001" -p SC1_BILLING -u SC1_BILLING -v
echo "dai-billing-${VERSION}" > /var/www/html/scrum1/bill.txt echo "dai-billing-${VERSION}" > /var/www/html/scrum1/billdb.txt
